custom_nodes.author: filliptm
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-FL-DiffVSR
custom_nodes.description: FL DiffVSR - Diffusion-based video super-resolution nodes for ComfyUI. Features 4x upscaling with temporal coherence using Stream-DiffVSR for smooth, artifact-free video enhancement. Supports text-guided upscaling, chunked processing for memory efficiency, and automatic model downloading from HuggingFace.

custom_nodes.author: molbal
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-LLM-CLIP
custom_nodes.description: These nodes allow you to use a distilled Qwen3-4B model as your text encoder in Stable Diffusion XL.

custom_nodes.author: relhamdi
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-RE-CustomUtils
custom_nodes.description: A collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: tritant
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_Kitchen_nvfp4_Converter
custom_nodes.description: Convert to nvfp4, support Z-image-turbo, flux.1 and more

custom_nodes.author: PozzettiAndrea
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-CameraPack
custom_nodes.description: Camera utilities for ComfyUI. Convert between camera formats (DA3 extrinsics/intrinsics to Load3DCamera for Preview3D).

custom_nodes.author: BobRandomNumber
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Calculator
custom_nodes.description: Calculator

custom_nodes.author: D-Ogi
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Attention-Optimizer
custom_nodes.description: Automatically benchmark and optimize attention in diffusion models. 1.5-2x speedup on RTX 4090, up to 4x on video models.

custom_nodes.author: capitan01R
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ZImageTurbo-FlowSampler
custom_nodes.description: Rectified-flow samplers for Z-Image-Turbo. Clean interpolation formula without sigma division, linear schedulers, higher-order variants. Fixes built-in euler/euler_ancestral instability issues

custom_nodes.author: DevDuckFace
custom_nodes.title: KsamplerDF
custom_nodes.description: A custom ComfyUI node that splits sampling steps between a main sampler and a refiner sampler, with independent denoise control for each phase, with upscalers now

custom_nodes.author: rockerBOO
custom_nodes.title: pixel-sorting
custom_nodes.description: ASDF-style pixel sorting implementation in Python with extended features

custom_nodes.author: xela-io
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-HairDetailer
custom_nodes.description: Comprehensive custom node pack for detecting hair regions, creating precise masks, and enhancing hair details in images with 6 specialized nodes for various hair processing workflows. (Description by CC)

custom_nodes.author: kakachiex2
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-ltx2-efficient
custom_nodes.description: High-performance custom node for LTX2 video generation designed to reduce GPU usage, VRAM requirements, and temperature on consumer GPUs.

custom_nodes.author: SlothHole
custom_nodes.title: Imitatoes
custom_nodes.description: Build a ComfyUI "self-improving" workflow where each render is evaluated by a local vision LLM, which then edits the prompt/parameters and triggers another run.

custom_nodes.author: BobJohnson24
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Flux2-INT8
custom_nodes.description: This node speeds up Flux2, Chroma, Z-Image in ComfyUI by using INT8 quantization, delivering ~2x faster inference on my 3090, but it should work on any NVIDIA GPU with enough INT8 TOPS.

custom_nodes.author: smartvain
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-PromptComment
custom_nodes.description: Custom ComfyUI node providing comment stripping functionality for prompts with multiple marker styles. (Description by CC)

custom_nodes.author: kayorlian
custom_nodes.title: ComfyuiSmartColorMatch
custom_nodes.description: Custom node for ComfyUI that performs color matching between reference and generated images with support for masking.

custom_nodes.author: uczensokratesa
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Gemini-VAE-Fix
custom_nodes.description: Advanced VAE decoder node with audio sync precision and crash-proof memory management for long videos. (Description by CC)

custom_nodes.author: uczensokratesa
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-UniversalSmartVAE
custom_nodes.description: VRAM-safe VAE decoder for video latents in ComfyUI. Decodes 5D video latents in temporal batches to prevent GPU memory explosions.

custom_nodes.author: rdanalex
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ClownSampler
custom_nodes.description: A standalone ComfyUI node for loading samplers and providing their names as string outputs.

custom_nodes.author: rgamevfx
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-RGnodes
custom_nodes.description: VFX and video utility nodes. Avoiding opening other apps/clearing other caches.

custom_nodes.author: zhaocaiji
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Mute-Switch
custom_nodes.description: A smart logic switch for ComfyUI that physically mutes upstream nodes to save GPU/CPU resources, featuring dynamic inputs and auto-cleanup.

custom_nodes.author: knishika62
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-LyricForge
custom_nodes.description: AI music generation node (for HeartMuLa) that auto-generates style tags and lyrics from keywords, supporting OpenAI/Claude/local LLM APIs and multilingual lyrics (Japanese, English, Chinese, Korean, Spanish). (Description by CC)

custom_nodes.author: Pedreiro-Digital-Studio-Ltda
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-PromptPerfect
custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes for ComfyUI with Prompt Perfect GPT functionality.

custom_nodes.author: princepainter
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-PainterAI2V
custom_nodes.description: InfiniteTalk lip-sync node optimized for Wan2.2 dual-model workflow with first/last frame precision control and FPS synchronization. (Description by CC)

custom_nodes.author: cedarconnor
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Skeletonretarget
custom_nodes.description: A custom node pack for ComfyUI that aligns and retargets skeletal pose data from driving videos to match reference images, enabling consistent motion transfer. (Description by CC)

custom_nodes.author: laolaoruqin
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-free-drag-crop

custom_nodes.author: hyukudan
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-video-resolution
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI node for selecting video resolutions with preset dimensions for video generation models like LTX, CogVideo, and Hunyuan. (Description by CC)

custom_nodes.author: ncky
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Qwen3-TTS
custom_nodes.description: Custom node that wraps Qwen3-TTS voice cloning for synthesizing speech in a cloned voice. (Description by CC)

custom_nodes.author: princepainter
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-PainterFrameCount
custom_nodes.description: Aligns any input frame number to the nearest 4N+1 format, ensuring compatibility with video generation models that require specific frame count constraints.

custom_nodes.author: princepainter
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-PainterVideoUpscale
custom_nodes.description: Automatically scales your input video to specified dimensions and encodes it into latent space for sampling.

custom_nodes.author: princepainter
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-PainterMultiF2V
custom_nodes.description: A long-form video generation suite that chains keyframe images into coherent videos with automatic segment transitions and cross-dissolves. (Description by CC)

custom_nodes.author: TechnicalTod
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-RotoMask
custom_nodes.description: A rotoscoping tool for ComfyUI that allows you to create animated masks using polygon curves with keyframe interpolation.

custom_nodes.author: uczensokratesa
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Claude-VAE
custom_nodes.description: VAE Decode node that solves VRAM problems with mathematically precise temporal stitching, maintaining perfect frame counts across batch sizes for video generation.

custom_nodes.author: jajos12
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui-WanVideo-Context
custom_nodes.description: Advanced context management node for WanVideo using Intent-Aware Mixture of Contexts (MoC) system with hybrid memory, multi-modal retrieval, and temporal diversity. (Description by CC)

custom_nodes.author: balu112121
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui_Hivision_ID_photo_layout
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom node for ID photo layout with support for custom paper sizes, orientation, rows/columns, spacing, margins, and grid display. (Description by CC)

custom_nodes.author: uczensokratesa
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Grok-SmartVAE
custom_nodes.description: Most durable and flexible VAE decoder for ComfyUI designed for long video sequences with crash-proof dynamic batching, temporal scale detection, and aggressive out-of-memory recovery. (Description by CC)

custom_nodes.author: Candlehead
custom_nodes.title: Candlehead-Comfy-Nodez
custom_nodes.description: Comprehensive suite of utility nodes for ComfyUI including AspectToRes, ImageInfo, and TextProcessor for image processing workflows.

custom_nodes.author: Meisoftcoltd
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-sequential-batcher
custom_nodes.description: The ultimate tool for creating complex iterative workflows and frame-by-frame video processing in ComfyUI, designed to handle huge tasks without GPU crashes using intelligent sequential looping.

custom_nodes.author: licanhua
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-StrokeReveal
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node that creates an animated stroke reveal effect, where a brush/pen follows a mask edge to reveal an image with feathered blending and 8 direction support.

custom_nodes.author: K3nt3L
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-S1Z35
custom_nodes.description: Basic nodes for image ratios and size presets (all models)

custom_nodes.author: Niutonian
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-niutonian-smart-image
custom_nodes.description: A comprehensive ComfyUI custom node suite for intelligent image stitching, processing, and manipulation with automatic handling of empty/bypassed inputs.

custom_nodes.author: FearL0rd
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-AnyDeviceOffload
custom_nodes.description: Force any Model, VAE, or CLIP to any GPU or CPUâ€”and keep it there (or don't).

custom_nodes.author: hetima
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-SingleLinePicker
custom_nodes.description: Select one line from the text list with a single click. It dramatically improves the process of switching LoRA or prompts.

custom_nodes.author: bkpaine1
custom_nodes.title: Halo-TeaCache
custom_nodes.description: AMD Unified Memory TeaCache for LTX2 (LTXAV). Lean single-file caching for 48-layer dual-stream transformer. Caches both video and audio residuals. No CPU offload - designed for AMD APUs with unified memory. ~35% speedup on cached denoising steps.

custom_nodes.author: frankluise5220
custom_nodes.title: LoraHelper Chat Nodes
custom_nodes.description: LLM-based chat nodes for image description, tagging and prompt enhancement using GGUF models

custom_nodes.author: gmorks
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-WatchPoint
custom_nodes.description: Multi-monitor preview with external window (zoom, pan, save), floating in-browser preview, and prompt monitoring. Features stable threading, customizable positioning, and Signal Scout for real-time prompt tracking.

custom_nodes.author: liewcc
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Qwen-Canvas
custom_nodes.description: Enforces Qwen's training resolution buckets for precise Latent space generation.

custom_nodes.author: FNGarvin
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Auto Model Downloader
custom_nodes.description: Convenient, high-speed model downloads directly to your Comfy install with blazing-fast, multi-connection support. No more downloading models to your downloads folder and having to manually move them to the proper folder!

custom_nodes.author: c0dezer019
custom_nodes.title: Pausable Sampler
custom_nodes.description: Modifed Sampler nodes that allow you to pause/resume generations. For those with older hardware running in CPU mode or old GPUs. Useful for managing thermals.

custom_nodes.author: mingyi456
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI DFloat11 Extended
custom_nodes.description: Fork of the official DF11 ComfyUI custom node that supports a wider variety of model architectures, and provides fixes for compatibility with recent ComfyUI versions. Also, LoRAs are supported for select model architectures.

custom_nodes.author: Urabewe
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-AudioTools
custom_nodes.description: Audio normalization and enhancement nodes for ComfyUI (LUFS normalization, audio processing utilities).

custom_nodes.author: aledelpho
custom_nodes.title: Arthemy Live Tuner - Z-image
custom_nodes.description: Advanced real-time control for Z-Image models and Qwen3-4B Text Encoders. These nodes allow you to change your model's weights to boost or lower specific generative phases.

custom_nodes.author: CrateTools
custom_nodes.title: Preview Video Monitor Pro
custom_nodes.description: Second monitor preview for video generations with interactive playback controls, color tools, generation tracking, and workflow-embedded snapshots.

custom_nodes.author: loficoding
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Node HUD
custom_nodes.description: Adds a smart I/O status dock to stacked nodes for cleaner layouts.

custom_nodes.author: room3dev
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-I2VChainHelper
custom_nodes.description: Helps filter and trim image batches for I2V chaining by ensuring consistent face identity and eye openness.

custom_nodes.author: laowang
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI PixelArt Converter
custom_nodes.description: Convert images to pixel art using ONNX models.

custom_nodes.author: sjhddh
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Cyber-Steganography
custom_nodes.description: Cyberpunk/Spy-craft steganography nodes for ComfyUI. Hide secret text messages inside AI-generated images using LSB (Least Significant Bit) steganography. Features encryption with optional password key. Nodes: StegoEncode (hide text), StegoDecode (reveal text).

custom_nodes.author: pixelpainter
custom_nodes.title: UI-Decorators [SubGraph]
custom_nodes.description: UI Decorators is a set of 4 nodes to enhance frontside SubGraph usability and organization. A Note, a Divider, an editable Spacer, and a Title node. Includes color pickers for fonts, font sizing, bold/non-bold text, and background color picker for the note

custom_nodes.author: Xz3r0
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Xz3r0-Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Some custom nodes: XMath, XResolution, XImageSave, XVideoSave, XLatentLoad, XLatentSave ...and more

custom_nodes.description: A collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI by Mickmumpitz.

custom_nodes.author: gen1nya

custom_nodes.description: Offload image upscaling to a remote server with a dedicated GPU. Real-time progress streaming via SSE.

custom_nodes.author: martin-rizzo
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ZImagePowerNodes
custom_nodes.description: A set of ComfyUI nodes designed and fine-tuned specifically for the Z-Image model. Pushing the best image generation model to its limits!

custom_nodes.description: A lightweight annotation overlay for ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes for sharp frame selection and analysis. (Description by CC)

custom_nodes.author: ato-zen
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-VIBE
custom_nodes.description: Implementation of VIBE (Visual Instruction Based Editor) as a custom node for ComfyUI that enables image editing using natural language instructions leveraging Sana1.5 and Qwen3-VL models.

custom_nodes.author: FallenIncursio
custom_nodes.title: arcenciel-link-comfyui

custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node that translates text (including prompts) using Google's open-weight TranslateGemma models.
